sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_8c9cddb583e85650e4af6170deaad3e7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name/><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name/><script><![CDATA[var UserRoleChecker = Class.create();
UserRoleChecker.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    isUserLender: function() {
        // Berechtigungspr端fung hier einf端gen, falls erforderlich
        if (!gs.hasRole('verleiher_user')) {
            return 'false';
        }

        var userSysId = this.getParameter('sys_id');
        var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        
        if (user.get(userSysId)) {
            var roles = new GlideRecord('sys_user_role');
            roles.addQuery('user', userSysId);
            roles.query();
            
            while (roles.next()) {
                if (roles.role.name == 'verleiher_user') {
                    return 'true';
                }
            }
        }
        return 'false';
    },

    type: 'UserRoleChecker'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>amine</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-10 14:24:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c9cddb583e85650e4af6170deaad3e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="BorrowNOW" source="x_1521148_borrowno">d400f82383141210e4af6170deaad331</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BorrowNOW">d400f82383141210e4af6170deaad331</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8c9cddb583e85650e4af6170deaad3e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>amine</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-10 14:24:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
